page.title: 02DESCRIPTION RURAL ROXWELL
page.content: This area between{Roxwell and {Willingale}is quite flat.It hasn't got many houses as it is mainly farmland. There are 36 homes with 66 adults and 27 children. 13 people work on the 10 farms and 7 work in Chelmsford. There are 39 motor vehicles and 15 bicycles; only 2 use the Bus. Farm products include{MUSHROOMS {PIGS, BEEF CATTLE, WILLOW FOR BATS, {TURKEYS, CORN, POTATOES, PEAS, RAPE, {BEANS.} This area has a lot of trees. In some places it is damp and wet where there are a lot of willow trees. It has a lot of paddocks and in some of the fields are friesian cows. Lightfoots, in the summer has a little pony club and they practise on the horse jumps in the fields. They hold a disco at the end of the week.
